form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-4-000

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP 42512 APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION 11-6-80 Mail or take to: 8:00 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name THIEU, BANH TYPE.) No. A21-203-763. Section of Law 316a 1 Date: JUNE 16, 1980 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is THIEV, BANH (Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 817SOUTHBURLINGTONAVENUE#302 (Number and street, Los- ANGELIS L.A. C A. 90057 (City. county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 01-01-1915 in CANTRACCHINA) (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to BEN-SHAW (5) Other names I have used are: NONE (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on JULY 03 1975 2 Yes No under the name of thom Bani 3 (Month) (Day) (Year) at (City) (State) I757 gm (11) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of CALIFORNIA where I now live since JULY-3,1975 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 59 months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes D No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST of 350 60 FROM - 11/75 To Qty STREET ADDRESS 19.78 11/99 CITY AND STATE a, (a) MARCH PRESENT TIME 860 FIGUEROA TERRACE #4 L.A DIATE (b) NOVEMBER 19.75 MARCH 1978 636 ALPINE ST # 5 L.A CA (c) JULY 1975 NOVEMBER 1975 2420 N. WESTMORELAND #4 " 11 (d) 5 19 (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES none (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES mene RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES C Form N-400 (Rev. 11-26-79)N (OVER) (1)
